projects.name: Mountain Protocol
projects.description: A digital asset protocol focused on providing secure and regulated solutions for asset issuance and management.

assets.assetDescription: A stablecoin that has been added to CurveFinance's crvUSD PegKeeper module
A wrapped version of USDM that can be created or unwrapped using the Mountain Protocol's DeFi app

projects.name: Superstate
projects.description: Superstate Inc. provides innovative financial services and investment management solutions, focusing on maximizing value for clients through trusted partnerships.

assets.assetDescription: The Superstate Short Duration US Government Securities Fund (the “Fund”) offers Qualified Purchasers access to short-duration Treasury Bills.
The Superstate Crypto Carry Fund (the “Fund”) offers Qualified Purchasers access to crypto basis (differential between the spot and future price) strategies.

projects.name: OpenEden
projects.description: OpenEden offers blockchain-based financial services, including secure asset custody, compliance, and risk management solutions tailored for institutional clients.

assets.assetDescription: A tokenized T-Bill that gives crypto treasury managers on-chain access to one of the most common cash management instruments

projects.name: Ondo Finance
projects.description: Ondo Finance is a pioneering platform that facilitates the seamless swapping, allocation, and diversification of fully backed real-world asset tokens. It empowers users to access stable yields and innovative investment opportunities while securely harnessing on-chain value..

assets.assetDescription: A stablecoin alternative that offers yield and is backed by short-term US Treasuries and bank demand deposits.
An institutional-grade investment that provides liquid exposure to short-term US Treasuries.

projects.name: PVO1
projects.description: PV01 is a platform that allows institutional investors and issuers to access bond markets in a transparent and efficient way. PV01 acts as a broker-dealer and arranger for digital bond issuers, managing the sales, book-building, and structuring process.

assets.assetDescription: A one-for-one equivalent of a US Treasury Bill that can be used as collateral. TBL tokens are transferable and can be invested and traded.
PV01 issued the first digital native bond on the Ethereum blockchain, which was backed by a US Treasury Bill. The bond was represented by a transferable token that could be used as collateral. .

projects.name: Midas
projects.description: Midas is a blockchain protocol that specializes in asset tokenization, providing institutional-grade digital assets and innovative investment products. It seamlessly integrates traditional finance with decentralized solutions, offering users competitive yields and secure investment opportunities.

assets.assetDescription: Midas's Bitcoin product offering that provides a 4% BTC-denominated yield.
A token that provides exposure to short-term U.S. Treasuries and was opened to retail traders in the EU.
A token that was also opened to retail traders in the EU, offering a market-neutral strategy.

projects.name: Matrix Dock
projects.description: Matrixdock is a platform that enables seamless swapping, allocation, and diversification of fully backed real-world asset tokens. By securely harnessing on-chain value, it empowers users to access risk-free yields and innovative investment opportunities.

assets.assetDescription: Short-Term US Treasury Bill Token enables risk-free yields from U.S. Treasury securities and reverse repos. Pegged 1:1 to USD, interest is rebased to holders’ STBT balances daily.
Each Matrixdock Gold (XAUm) token is backed by one fine troy ounce of high grade LBMA physical gold, stored in reputable custodian vaults in Asia.
Wrapped STBT token that allows for enhanced functionality and interoperability within the Matrixdock ecosystem.
